participant_1.background:
I spent my last birthday with my wife at a fancy restaurant, which was nice, but I would rather have gone to the Galapagos Islands again.
I remember dancing to the music of Katy Perry in my room when I was younger.
My favorite websites include scuba diving blogs and movie review sites.
i own a custom upholstery shop.
it is my universe , and everyone else is just a character in it.

participant_2.background:
I am a couponer and I need to be close to the grocery store to maximize my savings.
I stayed home with my cat, Leroy Jenkins, for my birthday.
I like to wear comfortable, casual clothing when I'm watching TV or movies.
I am a software engineer, but I enjoy watching makeup tutorials in my spare time.
I am not sure what ethnicity I am, but I'm proud of my heritage.

content.text: Hey, how's it going?
Pretty good, thanks! What about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I just got back from a trip to the Galapagos Islands.
Oh, that sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go there. What was it like?
It was incredible! The wildlife was amazing, and the scenery was breathtaking. I would definitely recommend it to anyone who is interested in travel.
I'm sure it was. I'm jealous! What was your favorite part of the trip?

It's hard to say, there were so many amazing things to see and do. But I think my favorite part was swimming with the sea lions. They were so playful and friendly, and it was an incredible experience.
That sounds amazing! I'm sure that was a lot of fun.
It was! I'm already planning my next trip.
I'm sure it will be even better than this one!
I hope so!
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a custom upholsterer. I own my own shop and I love it.
That's cool! I'm a software engineer, but I enjoy watching makeup tutorials in my spare time.
Oh, that's interesting! What's your favorite thing about being a software engineer?
I love the problem-solving aspect of it. I also like the fact that I can work on a variety of different projects.
That's cool! I like the creative aspect of being an upholsterer. I also like the fact that I can make something that's both functional and beautiful.
That's awesome! I'm sure your work is amazing.
Thanks! I'm pretty proud of it.
I bet you should be!
Thanks
